title: Who are the crappy announcers for the Seahawks.  Their talk is so ANTI-Seahawks & pro the other team.  I wonder why they were picked!!
text:
However, I wasn't sure if you were posting a serious question or just
making a comment.



If you would like to make a comment, here's a link where you can do
that: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12008
